actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to require each State, under the AFDC program, to establish a maximum income level beyond which an individual or family may not be eligible for aid to families with dependent children.

summary.text: Amends Part A of Title IV of the Social Security Act (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) to require each State, under such program, to establish a maximum income level beyond which an individual or family may not be eligible for aid.

titles.title: A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to require each State, under the AFDC program, to establish a maximum income level beyond which an individual or family may not be eligible for aid to families with dependent children.
